rating/editable.highlightedCode:
'use client';

import { useState } from 'react';
import { Alert, AlertIcon, AlertTitle } from '@/components/ui/alert';
import { Rating } from '@/components/ui/rating';
import { toast } from 'sonner';
import { CircleAlert } from 'lucide-react';


export default function RatingEditableDemo() {
  const [productRating, setProductRating] = useState(0);
  const handleRatingChange = (rating: number) => {
    setProductRating(rating);

    toast.custom(
      (t) => (
        <Alert variant="mono" icon="success" close={true} onClose={() => toast.dismiss(t)}>
          <AlertIcon>
            <CircleAlert/>
          </AlertIcon>
          <AlertTitle>Rated <span className="font-bold">{rating}</span> out of 5</AlertTitle>
        </Alert>
      ),
      {
        duration: 5000,
      },
    )
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-8">
      <Rating 
        rating={productRating} 
        editable={true} 
        onRatingChange={handleRatingChange}
        showValue={true} 
      />
    </div>
  );
}

rating/show-value.highlightedCode:
import { Rating } from '@/components/ui/rating';

export default function RatingDemo() {
	return (
		<Rating rating={4.5} showValue={true} />
	);

    </div>
  );
}

rating/statistics.highlightedCode:
import { Rating } from '@/components/ui/rating';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';

export default function RatingStatisticsDemo() {
  // Sample rating statistics data
  const ratingStats = {
    average: 4.3,
    totalReviews: 1247,
    breakdown: [
      { stars: 5, count: 745, percentage: 59.7 },
      { stars: 4, count: 312, percentage: 25.0 },
      { stars: 3, count: 124, percentage: 9.9 },
      { stars: 2, count: 41, percentage: 3.3 },
      { stars: 1, count: 25, percentage: 2.0 },
    ]
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-8">
      {/* Rating Statistics Overview */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Rating Statistics</h3>
        <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">
          Complete rating breakdown with statistics and progress bars
        </p>

        {/* Main Rating Display */}
        <div className="p-6 border rounded-lg space-y-6">
          <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-6 items-start md:items-center">
            {/* Overall Rating */}
            <div className="text-center space-y-2">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold">{ratingStats.average}</div>
              <Rating rating={ratingStats.average} size="lg" />
              <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">
                Based on {ratingStats.totalReviews.toLocaleString()} reviews
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Rating Breakdown */}
            <div className="flex-1 space-y-3">
              {ratingStats.breakdown.map((item) => (
                <div key={item.stars} className="flex items-center gap-3">
                  {/* Star Rating */}
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-1 w-20">
                    <span className="text-sm font-medium">{item.stars}</span>
                    <Rating rating={1} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
                  </div>

                  {/* Progress Bar */}
                  <div className="flex-1">
                    <Progress value={item.percentage} className="h-2" />
                  </div>

                  {/* Count and Percentage */}
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-2 w-20 text-sm text-muted-foreground">
                    <span>{item.count}</span>
                    <span>({item.percentage}%)</span>
                  </div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Individual Rating Examples */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Individual Rating Examples</h3>
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-4">
          {/* 1 Star */}
          <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg text-center space-y-3">
            <h4 className="font-medium">1 Star</h4>
            <Rating rating={1} showValue />
            <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Poor</p>
          </div>

          {/* 2 Stars */}
          <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg text-center space-y-3">
            <h4 className="font-medium">2 Stars</h4>
            <Rating rating={2} showValue />
            <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Fair</p>
          </div>

          {/* 3 Stars */}
          <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg text-center space-y-3">
            <h4 className="font-medium">3 Stars</h4>
            <Rating rating={3} showValue />
            <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Good</p>
          </div>

          {/* 4 Stars */}
          <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg text-center space-y-3">
            <h4 className="font-medium">4 Stars</h4>
            <Rating rating={4} showValue />
            <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Very Good</p>
          </div>

          {/* 5 Stars */}
          <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg text-center space-y-3">
            <h4 className="font-medium">5 Stars</h4>
            <Rating rating={5} showValue />
            <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Excellent</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Different Rating Averages */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Rating Averages</h3>
        <div className="space-y-3">
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <span className="w-16 text-sm font-medium">4.8/5:</span>
            <Rating rating={4.8} showValue />
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">(Excellent)</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <span className="w-16 text-sm font-medium">4.3/5:</span>
            <Rating rating={4.3} showValue />
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">(Very Good)</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <span className="w-16 text-sm font-medium">3.7/5:</span>
            <Rating rating={3.7} showValue />
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">(Good)</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <span className="w-16 text-sm font-medium">2.4/5:</span>
            <Rating rating={2.4} showValue />
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">(Fair)</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <span className="w-16 text-sm font-medium">1.2/5:</span>
            <Rating rating={1.2} showValue />
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">(Poor)</span>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Compact Statistics Display */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Compact Statistics</h3>
        <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg">
          <div className="grid grid-cols-5 gap-4 text-center">
            <div className="space-y-1">
              <div className="text-lg font-bold">745</div>
              <Rating rating={5} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
              <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">60%</div>
            </div>
            <div className="space-y-1">
              <div className="text-lg font-bold">312</div>
              <Rating rating={4} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
              <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">25%</div>
            </div>
            <div className="space-y-1">
              <div className="text-lg font-bold">124</div>
              <Rating rating={3} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
              <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">10%</div>
            </div>
            <div className="space-y-1">
              <div className="text-lg font-bold">41</div>
              <Rating rating={2} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
              <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">3%</div>
            </div>
            <div className="space-y-1">
              <div className="text-lg font-bold">25</div>
              <Rating rating={1} maxRating={1} size="sm" />
              <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">2%</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
